co1.title: Example 1: 250 articles about the genus Abies, Pinus and/or Picea
co1.description: The first example. Conifers are the target of this software, so an easy first choice to test it with.

zi1.title: Example 2: 500 articles about Zika, Dengue or the Spondweni genus
zi1.description: The second example. ContentMine does a lot with Zika, so why not prove this software can handle that too?
